answers.answer: Hi there!Fungal infection could be the cause of the while layer on the face long with loss of hair itching, burning and acne. This may require a prolonged course of oral/ topical anti-fungal agents, which I understand would have already been advised by your doctor. In addition it is advised to keep the region clean and dry at all times. Wash the face frequently with a mild soap and avoid using creams and oil. You may also like to get yourself tested for diabetes, since it could be a trigger factor involved.Hope this is helpful.Take care!
